title: [SOLVED]820-2978 short to ground after uc
message:
working on this 820-2978 that had liquid damage all around the u2594 area had to replace U2594,u6901,c2599,r2590,c5025,and c4906. a couple had blown off the legs on pp3v42 side or were super corroded but the machine still ran. so i replaced those and put in uc and now it doesnt power up. poked around and saw i am missing pm_slp_s4_L and have a short to ground on PPVCORE_S0_CPU.

not really sure where to go on this but any help would be awesome.

title: [SOLVED]820-2978 short to ground after uc
message: okay not really sure what has happened here. i posted above took the board to my other desk and had a thought to plug in a 60w adapter. what do you know it fired right up. now it even fires with an 85w. not really sure how this could happen maybe the forum scared it into working again. problem solved
